original_text: Inside the east gate were three alcoves on each side; the three had the same measurements, and the faces of the projecting walls on each side had the same measurements.
korean_text: 그 동문간의 문지기 방은 왼쪽에 셋이 있고 오른쪽에 셋이 있으니 그 셋이 각각 같은 크기요 그 좌우편 벽도 다 같은 크기며

sentences.original_text: were three alcoves on each side
sentences.korean_translation: 양쪽에 세 개의 작은 방이 있었다

sentences.original_text: the three had the same measurements
and the faces of the projecting walls
on each side had the same measurements
